name: Coins.ph
intro: Southeast Asia's leading mainstream super app
introduce: Coins.ph is Southeast Asia's leading mainstream super app that boasts over 16 million users with licensed fiat and crypto wallet and exchange services including cryptocurrencies, e-wallet, and payments. The Company is regulated by the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) and hold both Virtual Currency and Electronic Money Issuer licenses from a central bank.
